name: Cyberwalk 2077, CYBERPUNK Unity Clone
description:
I was so hyped for upcoming Cyberpunk 2077 so I made my own.

This game is First Person Adventure 

with 2 Levels and some Objective to do.

* Find and Examine Photos

* Find out the code from Apartment

* Explore Open World - Streets of Future in the year 2077

Game is made in HDRP in Unity in less then 7 DAYS.
